# [Interview #447: BYU: TGS Midnight Release - Jennifer McBride, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=447#5)

#### Brandon Sanderson

His favorite chapters to write from
*The Gathering Storm*
were the concluding chapter and also chapter 22.
